H0.text: In 2015 Edgar Lungu became prime minister of. Zimbabwe

H1.text: In 2015 Edgar Lungu became prime minister of. Botswana

H2.text: In 2015 Edgar Lungu became prime minister of. Malawi

H3.text: In 2015 Edgar Lungu became prime minister of. Zambia

A4.text: Edgar Chagwa Lungu served as the sixth president of Zambia from 26 January 2015 to 24 August 2021.

A5.text: Lungu was elected as President of Zambia in the January 2015 presidential by-election.

A6.text: President Lungu confident of being re-elected

A7.text: The position of prime minister of Zambia was abolished in 1991 and has not been reinstated since.
